item.description:
El Secreto de Sus Ojos!
2010 Academy Award-winner: Best Foreign Language Film

Mystery, plot twists, Argentina...the trailer for this film looks really intriguing...and it's playing at the Coolidge Corner Cinema, which is accessible on the "C" line (Coolidge Corner stop) and the 66 bus.

Let's plan on making it to the 4:25 PM showing Saturday, and then those interested can grab dinner at a nearby hot spot after.

Update: There is a 4:25 PM showing Saturday; the theater there has 45 seats. I purchased my ticket in advance and encourage others to do the same if you are afraid it will sell out. To do so, go to the following link: http://coolidge.org/?.... Click on "4:25 PM" on Saturday, May 22.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in front of the cinema

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group
